simulated_ratings.title: The Favourite (2018)

simulated_ratings.title: Dogtooth (2009)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Disturbing, absurd, and razor-controlled in a way that thrilled me.

simulated_ratings.title: Under the Skin (2013)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Minimal, tactile longing over words—moodier than moving for me, but still alluring.

simulated_ratings.feeling: Deadpan cruelty and decency collide with a moral chill I appreciated.
